column4: just touching in, am downloading ubuntu as you read this, really wanting to know how painless the setting up of WiFi is on an old IBM T30?
What wireless chipset does that laptop have?
additionaly http://thinkwiki.org is a great resource for thinkpad owners.
Looks like that card uses the atheros chipset, it should be relatively painless is newer versions of Ubuntu.  For older versions see https://help.ubuntu.com/community/WifiDocs/Driver/Atheros
